mapper.sql: DISTINCT(A.CLASSES_CODE) AS classesCode, A.CLASSES_NAME AS classesName, A.DEL_FLG AS delFlg, A.CRT_ID AS crtId, A.CRT_TIME AS crtTime, A.UPD_ID AS updId, A.UPD_TIME AS updTime, A.ACT_ID AS actId, A.ACT_TIME AS actTime, A.VER AS ver
mapper.select:
SELECT
A.CLASSES_CODE , A.CLASSES_NAME, (CASE WHEN A.DEL_FLG='1' THEN '是' ELSE '否' END) AS DEL_FLG_1, B.BREED_CODE, B.BREED_NAME, B.CLASSESTREE_CODE, (CASE WHEN B.DEL_FLG='1' THEN '是' ELSE '否' END) AS DEL_FLG_2, C.FEATURE_CODE, C.FEATURE_NAME, (CASE WHEN C.DEL_FLG='1' THEN '是' ELSE '否' END) AS DEL_FLG_3 FROM pd_classes AS A LEFT JOIN pd_breed AS B ON B.CLASSES_CODE = A.CLASSES_CODE LEFT JOIN pd_feature AS C ON C.BREED_CODE = B.BREED_CODE AND C.CLASSES_CODE = A.CLASSES_CODE
AND (A.CLASSES_CODE LIKE #{filterMap.classesCode} OR A.CLASSES_NAME LIKE #{filterMap.classesCode})
AND (B.BREED_CODE like #{filterMap.breedCode} OR B.BREED_NAME like #{filterMap.breedCode})
AND (C.FEATURE_CODE like #{filterMap.featureCode} OR C.FEATURE_NAME like #{filterMap.featureCode})
ORDER BY A.CLASSES_CODE,B.BREED_CODE,C.FEATURE_CODE
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PD_CLASSES AS A
SELECT A.CLASSES_CODE AS classesCode, A.BREED_CODE AS breedCode FROM PD_BREED AS A WHERE A.CLASSES_CODE = #{filterMap.classesCode}

SELECT A.CLASSES_CODE AS classesCode, A.BREED_CODE AS breedCode, A.FEATURE_CODE AS featureCode FROM PD_FEATURE AS A WHERE A.CLASSES_CODE=#{filterMap.classesCode} AND A.BREED_CODE=#{filterMap.breedCode}
